Question: Leedarson IoT Technology Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LEEDARSON IoT Technology Inc.

Product: Smart Home Solutions

- Innovative Security Cameras, Alarm Systems, Connected Power, Lighting Control, and Digital ToB Solution
- Theme of SAFE, SAVE, SMART
- Rapidly expanding range of Matter-enabled products
- Focus on convenience, safety, and sustainability
- Participation in Project Connected Home over IP initiative
- Awarded Home Depot Partner of the Year
- Recognized as "National Intelligent Manufacturing Demonstration Factory"
- Renamed to LEEDARSON IoT Technology Inc. to reflect market maturity and business evolution
Summary_cn:
利得臣物联网技术有限公司

产品：智能家居解决方案

- 创新的安防摄像头、警报系统、连接电源、照明控制和数字商业解决方案
- 安全、节能、智能的主题
- 迅速扩展的Matter兼容产品范围
- 关注便利、安全和可持续性
- 参与项目Connected Home over IP倡议
- 荣获Home Depot年度合作伙伴称号
- 被评为"全国智能制造示范工厂"
- 更名为利得臣物联网技术有限公司以体现市场成熟和业务发展
